WorkItem.ClosedComment:
We are closing this work item, as this is probably not an issue in Prism. For additional support regarding this subject, you could create a thread in the discussions section, where we will help you with your concerns.

Regards,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
WorkItem.Description:
I can successfully build and run most of the Prism 4,Drop 8 libraries and samples under Silverlight, but I get the following exception when I run either the ModularityWithMef.Silverlight or ModularityWithUnity.Silverlight samples under IE8on XP32:
 
  Line: 54  Error: Unhandled Error in Silverlight Application   Code: 2103      Category: InitializeError         Message: Invalid or malformed application: Check manifest       Strangely, these same Silverlight samples run fine under the Firefox browser, but not under IE.
 
Any suggestions?
 
Thanks,Alex
WorkItem.Summary: Exception with Prism 4, Drop 8, Silverlight Modularity samples

Comments.Message:
Hi Alex,

I regress this issue for both Modularity QS on  XP 32 bit with IE 8 and couldn't reproduce this issue.  I did use Drop 9.   If you still have issues let us know.

thanks, Larry
